alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:53PM CDT until June 14 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Calhoun County in southwestern Arkansas... Ouachita County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Stephens, or 14 miles northeast of McNeil, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Camden... Hampton... Bearden... Chidester... Harrell... Poison Springs State Park... Cullendale... Ellisville... Hampton Municipal Airport... Highland Industrial Park... White Oak Lake State Park... East Camden... Tinsman... Artesian... Delhi... Harmony Grove... Millers Bluff... Frenchport... Elliot... Fairview in Ouachita County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
